org.fcrepo.legacy

Class FedoraNamespaces

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.AbstractResource
      • org.fcrepo.legacy.FedoraNamespaces

  • @Component(value="fedoraLegacyNamespaces")
@Scope(value="prototype")
public class FedoraNamespaces
extends org.fcrepo.AbstractResource
    The purpose of this class is to allow clients to manipulate the JCR namespaces in play in a repository. This is necessary to allow the use of traditional Fedora namespaced PIDs. Unlike Fedora Classic, a JCR requires that namespaces be registered before use. The catalog of namespaces is very simple, just a set of prefix-URI pairs.
    Author:
    ajs6f
